body.name: Seropy Roll Up Dish Drying Rack, Over The Sink Dish Drying Rack Kitchen Rolling Dish Drainer, Foldable Sink Rack Mat Stainless Steel Wire Dish Drying Rack for Kitchen Sink Counter Storage 17.5x11.8
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 17 hrs 3 mins
features: OVER THE SINK DRYING RACK : We have 5 different sizes for your option: 17.5(L) x 11.8(W) , 17.5(L) x 15.7(W), 17(L) x 13.7(W) , 20.5(L) x 13.7(W),17(L) x 11.8(W).Suitable for most kitchen sinks and counter. This over the sink dish drainer drying rack is 17.5(L) x 11.8(W) inch fits sink not wider than 16.5".Please check your sink measurements and choose the right size before purchasing the roll up dish drying rack over sink!A great addition to kitchen accessories and apartment necessities.Great kitchen gadgets for a tidy kitchen.

HIGH QUALITY : Made of 304 Stainless Steel with durable construction, the collapsible cutting board over sink is sturdy, rust resistant,non-slip, waterproof; support up to 33lbs, not easy to bend or twist by heavy cookware. A great portable stainless steel rolling rack for apartment essentials and home accessories.

MULTI-PURPOSE: This folding sink dish drying rack not only can be used as a dish drainer for air-drying kitchenware, such as washed bowls, pans, glasses, cups, plates, cookware, cutlery, saucepan, mugs; but also as a vegetable colander for fruit and veggie wash; or as a non-slip trivet mat for hot pots or bakeware on countertop. The dish drying mat can also be used as a kitchen sink caddy, sink cover, camping sink mat, sponge holder, over the sink colander, kitchen sink organizer for RV storage.

SPACE SAVING : The rollable kitchen drying rack is designed with 15 stainless steel tubes, fixed firmly by silicone, which makes it easy to use, lay flat, clean or put away for storing in cabinet when not in use, saving your counter space. This dish drying rack over the sink adjustable design frees up much counter space then traditional dish drainer. Perfect for house organization and storage. Great gifts for your parents, families, friends and perfect house warming gifts for new home.

FOOD SAFE AND HEAT RESISTANT : The dish draining rack with food safe grade silicone coated is heat resistant up to 400°F (204°C), BPA-free, dishwasher safe. As a perfect trivet for cooling down hot pans from oven or stovetop, or thawing frozen articles from refrigerator. Satisfaction guarantee and 2-year warranty. Any issue with this drying rack for sink organizers and storage, please contact us FIRST on order detail page before any return.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Seropy DISH DRYING RACK, HOME ESSENTIALS FOR NEW HOME!

DIMENSIONS: As handy home gadgets, this stainless steel dishes drying rack fits to most workstation sinks for drying oversize kitchen stuff such as cutting boards, pans, pots, etc. Great complement to RV accessories for inside.HEALTHY HOME PRODUCT: Good to rinse and dry fruit, veggies, herb, tableware, glassware, silverware, etc. The water drains right back into sink, rather than all over the counter.STAINLESS STEEL: This sink mat is strong, anti-rust, support up to 33lbs without deformation and warping. Perfect for kitchen sink organizers and storage.HEAT SAFE: Up to 400°F (204°C) . Can be used as a drying mat for kitchen counter as well as a heat resistant mat for hot food, prevent damage from hot items. Great kitchen essentials for every family.MULTI-FUNCTIONAL: This drying rack for cooking is ideal for drip drying dishes, cups, glasses, bowls, bottles; fruit, vegetables; served as an oven mat, etc; holding the chopping board over the sink to save counter space. This sink drying rack dishes organizer is a must have for kitchen sink accessories and camper accessories.FOLDABLE DRYING RACK: Unlike other bulky sink dish racks, this over the sink dish roll rack can be rolled up for easy storage and save countertop space. Perfect for RV kitchen accessories for camp, travel trailer, etc.EASY TO CLEAN: This drying mat for kitchen counter is food grade safe, oil-resistant and easy to clean by rinsing or dishwasher.

Note: Suitable for most kitchen sinks, such as home kitchen sinks, rv sinks, camper sinks, etc.Not suitable for farmer’s sink with one side not level.The roll up dish rack should overlap the sink when in use. To avoid buying the wrong size, please MEASURE THE SIZE OF YOUR SINK FIRST. Recommended sink size: 16.5'' or SHORTER.NOT support placing plates vertically in slots.Clean and dry the dish racks after each use to prevent it from being stained in a humid environment for a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Kitchen Gadget! Helps save countertop space!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Great affordable product! I love using this product when I only have a few dishes to wash, and I can just let them dry on the roll-up drying rack. It keeps my countertop space nice and clear since I used to put a towel down and let the dishes dry on the towel (before I bought this drying rack). I can place wine glasses upside down on the rack without having them tip over. I haven't placed anything too heavy on the rack yet, so I am not sure what the weight capacity is, but it holds cups, mugs, wine glasses, bowls, etc. very nicely!It rolls open and close easily and is aesthetically appealing! It is easy to clean and easy to store. I bought a second one of these for my sister-in-law to give to her for Christmas...I think she will enjoy it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Strong, well made dish drain. Rubber edge provides non slip traction. Can easily place dish/glasses on it and they won’t slip off. Easy to roll up and store away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fits snugly in limited space. Very pleased

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We need all the kitchen space we need, and this has helped. We use this over a regular sized sink and it just fits on it, so be aware that you are buying a rack that is pictured over the smaller sized sink. Rolls up easy and can be stashed away when needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile handy rack
reviews.reviewText: This rack has become my absolute favorite, and I use it almost every day. When my larger rack is full, this one comes in handy. It's not limited to just utensils; I also use it to dry vegetables, fruits, and more after washing. With some large mugs in my collection, the regular dish drying rack from Walmart takes up a lot of space, leaving little room for other utensils. However, the roll-up rack has made my life so much easier. I love how I can place my mugs on it after washing, and they dry up quickly. The airflow from both ends ensures that the insides dry up rapidly as well. While I can't guarantee it fits all sinks, it fits well in my standard-sized sink. Cleaning it, especially the crevices, can be a bit of a task at times.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very sturdy, fits my sink perfectly, I use it everyday. Great product, I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars More useful than I thought it would be
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised that I can utilize this rack for a few different things. Drying dishes of course, but also washing fruit and veggies easier, using a colander more easily, just set it on the rack instead of using another dish to dirty to catch water, less splashing of dirty water on food/dishes, less food wastage. Also it helps us personally keep up on dishes more. If we keep it up we fill up 1 side of the sink quicker, but then was them sooner, but not feel stressed that I only have 1 sided of the sink....the other clean sided is always there if needed. The lenght was a good fit and rubber edges really help slipping of rack, even with our tight spaced faucet. Time will tell how it holds up with use and water.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It has several different uses all positive
reviews.reviewText: I love this thing I don't have a dishwasher and I keep it on my sink when I wash dishes for some that do not fit well into the dish rack but I also use it for ice packs that are the old school kind that has the opening and it's kind of a cloth type where you put the ice cubes in and twist the cap on it so when I pour the water out the next day because I use it at night for surgeries I had and I'm supposed to ice I just let them drain on the rack but it's great when I do other non food related items that I can just sit there to drain that I used to have to sit in the sink which is gross and I don't want to do that regardless how clean it is or it's something that's in a strainer and I don't want to sit there and wait to try to get every little drop of water out I can just sit on top of the rack and let it do its thing well I move on to the next step of whatever recipe I'm trying. It has been a really useful little thing I was quite shocked I got the smallest size because I like to have an opening into the sink I would totally recommend it it's one of those things you didn't know you needed until you have one but I knew I needed it or thought from the reviews that I would most likely agree and I do.
Muito bom. Ocupa pouco espaço. Pode ser levado p viagens. Adorei!

I originally bought this rack to put over a double sink but it didn’t fit well. Instead I have consistently used it to put hot casseroles, saucepans etc. on straight from the oven. It is totally effective, easy to clean and can be folded up when not in use, which I never do! It’s very reasonably priced and highly recommended.
Un accessorio pratico in quanto arrotolabile, robusto e leggero
Very nice product little costly than the other products available on amazon but happy with the quality
